name: The Meaning of Life Is
description:
https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/48/the-meaning-of-life-is

What is deeper than the Meaning of Life?

What IS the Meaning of Life?

Take a break from being GOD OF ALL THINGS and figure it out!

Hopefully there won’t be too many distractions…

Controls: Enter, A-Z, Backspace

Hints:

  • “i” looks like a “j”. Try typing “i”
  • Don’t be afraid to ask for “Help”
